title: Push Notification appears when app on foreground
body:
# Bug Report

## Problem

When message received while app on foreground (even in the same chat message received in to) - push notification appears anyway.
The same happens when app appears on foreground from background - PN appears (again). 


#### Expected behavior
No PN appears if Status app on foreground

#### Actual behavior

If Status is running on foreground state or appears on foreground from background, - Push Notification appears for received message
![123fffdfdfdff](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8749671/69429550-7deb6880-0d3c-11ea-9b56-d9d743731ca3.gif)

### Reproduction 1

- Open Status and create new accounts UserA and UserB
- UserA enables `Notification` setting on `Profile`
- UserB sends message to UserA

### Reproduction 2

- Open Status and create new accounts UserA and UserB
- UserA enables `Notification` setting on `Profile`
- UserA puts app on background
- UserB sends message to UserA
**Actual result = Expected result** Push notification appears
- UserA opens Status from background
**Actual result:** PN appears for the last message received 


### Additional Information
- Status version: `develop 0.14.0 (2019112202)`
- Operating System: Android and iOS

#### Logs

Logcat starting before Status appears on foreground state and PN appears: 

No, with the new notifications it's all fine! No PN when Status is on foreground
